类 SparkleEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • SparkleEngine
  • public class SparkleEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    SparkleEngine - Very portable & reusable engine that wrapps various functions. All static methods. Rooted from grade 11 final project's engine, developed largely since then. Making the engine an actor to prevent repeatitively call dt = new Date().
    版本:
    0.4
    作者:
    Xuanxi Jiang

    • 方法详细资料

      • setBrightness

        public static greenfoot.GreenfootImage setBrightness​(greenfoot.GreenfootImage img,
                                                     int brt)
        Set the brightness of an image according to brt.
        参数:
        img - The given image
        brt - The brightness factor. less than 50 means shade, more than 50 means brighten.
        返回:
        GreenfootImage The processed input image that is either shaded or brightened by brt.

      • turnRed

        public static greenfoot.GreenfootImage turnRed​(greenfoot.GreenfootImage img,
                                               int perc)
        Turns an image to red by perc percent.
        参数:
        img - The given image
        perc - The percentage of turning red ranging from [0 to 100], 100 = fully red.
        返回:
        GreenfootImage The processed input image that is turned red by perc percent.

      • turnBlue

        public static greenfoot.GreenfootImage turnBlue​(greenfoot.GreenfootImage img,
                                                int perc)
        Turns an image to blue by perc percent.
        参数:
        img - The given image
        perc - The percentage of turning blue ranging from [0 to 100], 100 = fully blue.
        返回:
        GreenfootImage The processed input image that is turned blue by perc percent.

      • revColor

        public static greenfoot.GreenfootImage revColor​(greenfoot.GreenfootImage img,
                                                int perc)
        Reverses the color of a given image by a certain percentage.
        参数:
        img - The given image
        perc - The percentage of inversion ranging from [0 to 100], 100 = fully reverse.
        返回:
        GreenfootImage The processed input image that is reversed by perc percent.

      • shade

        public static greenfoot.GreenfootImage shade​(double shadeFactor,
                                             greenfoot.GreenfootImage img)

        Shades image (makes more black) according to shadeFactor.

        Usage: background = new GreenfootImage(SparkleEngine.shade(0.5, background));

        参数:
        shadeFactor - The factor of shade, ranges from [0 to 1.0]. 1.0 = completely black.
        img - The input image
        返回:
        GreenfootImage The input image, shaded by factor of brighten.

      • brighten

        public static greenfoot.GreenfootImage brighten​(double brightFactor,
                                                greenfoot.GreenfootImage img)

        Brightens image (makes more white) according to brightFactor.

        Usage: background = new GreenfootImage(SparkleEngine.brighten(0.5, background));

        参数:
        brightFactor - The factor of brighten, ranges from [0 to 1.0]. 1.0 = completely white.
        img - The input image
        返回:
        GreenfootImage The input image, brightened by factor of brighten.

      • getFrict

        public static double getFrict​(double mass,
                              double cof,
                              double gravity)

        Get force of friction of object in N

        Helpful in calculating the needed force to maintain velocity, etc.

        Remember: to maintain constant velocity: cva = getFrict()/mass

        (cva = acceleration to maintain constant velocity)

        Only works if y axis has no force other than gravity and normal force.

        If y axis has force: real friction = getFrict() + yForce*u

        参数:
        mass - The mass of the object
        cof - The coefficient of friction of the surface
        gravity - The gravity factor
        返回:
        double The force of friction of the given object.

      • dvDueToFrict

        public static double dvDueToFrict​(double vel,
                                  double accel,
                                  double mass,
                                  double cof,
                                  double gravity,
                                  double time)

        delta velocity due to friction

        F = m*a, Ff = mass*gravity*u (mass*gravity) = N, u = kinetic friction coefficient usage: spd = spd - dvDueToFrict();

        参数:
        vel - Velocity of object
        accel - Acceleration of object
        mass - Mass of object
        cof - Coeficcient of friction of the surface.
        gravity - The gravity factor
        time - Time of the motion.
        返回:
        int The change in velocity of provided object in the given time period.

      • getStringWidth

        public static int getStringWidth​(greenfoot.Font font,
                                 java.lang.String text)
        Gets the width of a string based on the font.
        参数:
        font - The font used to display the string.
        text - The string of text itself.
        返回:
        int The width of the string if displayed in the choosen font.

      • wordWrap

        public static java.lang.String wordWrap​(java.lang.String in,
                                        greenfoot.Font f,
                                        int mxLength)
        Takes in a string of words that needs to be alighned and automatically add '/n' to it.
        参数:
        in - The input string
        f - The font of the string that you will use to display
        mxLength - The maximum length that your string cannot exceed.
        返回:
        String Returns the string, formatted so that it will continue on next line if exceeds mxLength.

      • drawLable

        public static greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawLable​(greenfoot.Color c,
                                                 greenfoot.Font f,
                                                 int x,
                                                 int y,
                                                 java.lang.String text,
                                                 greenfoot.GreenfootImage in)
        Draws label on an GreenfootImage
        参数:
        c - The color of the lable
        f - The font of the lable
        x - The x position (relative to top left of the object) of the lable
        y - The y position (relative to top left of the object) of the lable.
        text - The text on the lable
        返回:
        GreenfootImage Returns the image with lable drawn on it.

      • ManhattenDistance

        public static int ManhattenDistance​(int fromX,
                                    int fromY,
                                    int toX,
                                    int toY)
        Get the Manhatten Distance of two objects.
        参数:
        fromX - The X coordinate of source object
        fromY - The Y coordinate of source object
        toX - The X coordinate of target object
        toY - The Y coordinate of target object
        返回:
        int Returns the manhatten distance between from object and to object.
